SELECT C.ID, T.CLEAR_ID, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.WORK_DATE, T.CUST_ID, T.ACCT_ID, IFNULL((SELECT TYPE_NAME FROM BASE_TYPE WHERE TYPE_SORT = 'BUSINESS_TYPE' AND TYPE_CODE = T.TRANS_TYPE),T.TRANS_TYPE) TRANS_TYPE, T.ACCT_NO, T.PAY_CARD_TYPE, T.ORDER_ID, T.QUERY_ID, T.ORIG_QRY_ID, T.TXN_TIME, T.CURRENCY_CODE, T.TXN_AMT, T.RESP_CODE, T.RESP_MSG, T.RESP_TIME, T.SETTLE_AMT, T.SETTLE_CURRENCY_CODE, T.SETTLE_DATE, T.TRACE_NO, T.TRACE_TIME, T.TXN_TYPE, T.TXN_SUB_TYPE, T.BIZ_TYPE, T.ACCESS_TYPE, T.MER_ID, T.REQ_RESERVED, T.RESERVED, T.EXCHANGE_DATE, T.EXCHANGE_RATE, T.VPC_TRANS_DATA, T.PAY_TYPE, T.PAY_CARD_NO, T.PAY_CARD_ISSUE_NAME, T.BIND_ID, T.BRIEF, T.INST_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(T.INST_DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS instDatetime FROM BAL_UNIONPAY_SEVEN_DATA_SOURCE T LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_RECHARGE C ON T.QUERY_ID = C.CHANNEL_SERIAL_SEQ
AND T.TRANS_FLOW_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transFlowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND C.ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.TRANS_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.WORK_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY T.INST_DATETIME DESC
